desc: Seen on the Today Show and What’s Up Moms! Cushy Closer® Door Cushion is the true original door cushion/door silencer since 2007! Cushy Closers provide just the right cushion and tension to allow most doors to close completely and quietly - no slamming or rattling and no accidental lock-ins. Enjoy the quiet!

layout.text: The Original Mom-Invented Cushy Closer® Door Cushion, Since 2007! When it comes to quiet doors, don't settle. You deserve the original.
